title: Magic Carpet Port Adventure #30
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Merchant's Spice Stall
rooms.description: A colorful market stall overflowing with exotic spices, silks, and trinkets. The air is thick with the scent of cinnamon and cardamom. Brass lanterns hang from the canopy, casting dancing shadows. A large wooden counter displays various goods, and a locked chest sits beneath it. Through the back, you can see the entrance to the carpet warehouse.

items.name: merchant's counter
items.description: A wooden counter covered with bowls of colorful spices and a brass scale

items.name: merchant's price list
items.description: A parchment scroll listing prices for various goods
items.text: MERCHANT PRICES - Saffron: 45 gold per ounce. Silk carpet (small): 120 gold. Flying carpet (enchanted): 888 gold. Note: Master Merchant Rashid keeps the warehouse key in the locked chest. Combination is the price of our finest flying carpet.

items.name: spice storage cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with three drawers for storing valuable spices

items.name: merchant's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with daily entries
items.text: Journal Entry: Business is good at the Magic Carpet Port! Master Merchant Rashid oversees all carpet sales. The carpets are stored in the Grand Warehouse. Young apprentice Farah helps with deliveries. Remember: only Rashid can authorize the use of the royal flying carpet for escape.

items.name: ornate brass key
items.description: A decorative brass key with carpet patterns engraved on it

items.name: merchant's locked chest
items.description: A heavy wooden chest bound with brass fittings and a keyhole

items.name: iron warehouse key
items.description: A large iron key labeled 'Warehouse Access'

items.name: note from Rashid
items.description: A note written in elegant script
items.text: To my fellow merchants: The warehouse contains our most valuable carpets. The royal flying carpet is kept in the launch platform beyond. Only those who know the port's secrets may access it. - Master Merchant Rashid

items.name: warehouse entrance
items.description: A sturdy wooden door with iron reinforcements leading to the carpet warehouse

rooms.name: Grand Carpet Warehouse
rooms.description: A vast warehouse filled with rolled carpets of every size and color stacked on wooden shelves reaching to the ceiling. Magical carpets hover slightly above their racks, glowing with enchantment. Dust motes dance in shafts of light from high windows. The walls are decorated with tapestries showing flying carpets soaring over desert landscapes. A magnificent door at the far end leads to the launch platform.

items.name: carpet display rack A
items.description: A rack holding various decorative carpets with information tags
items.text: Carpet Collection A - Woven by Master Weaver Farah in the Grand Warehouse. Each carpet tells a story of the desert winds and starlit skies.

items.name: carpet display rack B
items.description: A rack with enchanted flying carpets that shimmer with magic

items.name: carpet enchantment scroll
items.description: A magical scroll describing carpet enchantments
items.text: ENCHANTMENT GUIDE: Flying carpets are enchanted in the Moonlight Tower by our master enchanters. Each carpet is tested for safety before sale. The royal carpet awaits on the launch platform for emergency escapes.

items.name: shipping crate
items.description: A large wooden crate with shipping labels and documents

items.name: shipping manifest
items.description: A document listing carpet shipments and destinations
items.text: SHIPPING MANIFEST: Carpets shipped to: Moonlight Tower (enchantment facility), Desert Oasis (retail), Mountain Palace (royal orders). Warehouse Manager: Master Merchant Rashid. Assistant: Farah the Weaver.

items.name: carpet repair workbench
items.description: A workbench with tools and carpet samples

items.name: repair instructions
items.description: A note about carpet maintenance
items.text: REPAIR LOG: All damaged carpets sent to Moonlight Tower for re-enchantment. Farah handles minor repairs here in the warehouse. Major work requires Rashid's approval.

items.name: ornate launch platform door
items.description: A magnificent door carved with flying carpets and clouds. A brass plaque displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: Who is the Master Merchant of this port?
password_questions.hint: Check the merchant's journal and notes throughout the warehouse

password_questions.question: Where are carpets enchanted?
password_questions.hint: The enchantment scroll and shipping manifest mention this location

password_questions.question: Who weaves the carpets?
password_questions.hint: Look at the carpet rack labels and repair notes

rooms.name: Royal Flying Carpet Launch Platform
rooms.description: You've reached the launch platform! An open-air terrace high above the port city, with a breathtaking view of minarets, domes, and the sparkling harbor below. In the center floats a magnificent royal flying carpet, woven with gold thread and glowing with powerful enchantments. The carpet hovers gently, ready to carry you to freedom. Stars twinkle in the evening sky above.

items.name: royal flying carpet
items.description: A magnificent carpet of deep blue silk embroidered with golden stars and crescent moons, radiating magical energy

items.name: carpet control pedestal
items.description: A marble pedestal with magical controls for directing the flying carpet

items.name: brass telescope
items.description: A telescope pointed toward the horizon, showing distant lands and adventures

rooms.win_message: You step onto the royal flying carpet and it rises smoothly into the air! The carpet responds to your thoughts, soaring over the Magic Carpet Port as the city lights twinkle below. The warm desert wind rushes past as you fly toward freedom and new adventures. The merchants wave farewell from below. You have successfully escaped the Magic Carpet Port! You win!
